item.description:
The English Beat With Big D and the Kids Table.
Purchase Tickets at http://www.livenation...

Please RSVP only if you have purchased a ticket.
The shows are selling out.
Please don't delay in purchasing a ticket(s) for this wonderful band.
We can meet next door at 7pm, if anyone would like to for a bite before the show.
If not ,the shows start at 8 pm.
Get your dancing shoes on........ this band is amazing!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting at 6:30 for a bite to eat at 973 Commonwealth Ave

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: The English Beat
